original_text:
Moon Dancer
Una delle ricorrenze più famose della Cina è senza dubbio il Capodanno, festività che a differenza del mondo occidentale cade in primavera. Questa festa affonda le sue radici in una curiosa leggenda. Infatti, si narra che una terribile creatura chiama Nian, con l’arrivo della bella stagione si svegliasse per mangiare. Il cibo, neanche a dirlo, erano esseri umani. L’unica difesa contro il mostro erano il colore rosso e i rumori forti, di cui era terrorizzato.
Anche in Moon Dancer il colore predominante è il rosso e i simboli si rifanno tutti alla tradizione cinese. La grafica è ben calibrata, ricca di dettagli e con qualche animazione niente male. Nascoste dietro la griglia di gioco ci sono due ruote di cui possiamo scorrerne solo la metà. Durante gli spin queste ruote girano, mostrandoci i premi a cui possiamo ambire. In quella di sinistra sono segnalati i bonus e i moltiplicatori, in quella di destra i jackpot.
Nella parte sottostante ci sono tasti per giocare e quelli per settare al meglio la scommessa. La musica neanche a dirlo è orientaleggiante, rilassante al punto giusto.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia di gioco ha 5 rulli e 3 righe e ci sono 50 linee di pagamento su cui è possibile puntare minimo 1 €. La puntata massima è invece di 20 € e può essere impostata in un colpo solo cliccando sul pulsante Max. Si possono attivare sino a un massimo di 100 giri automatici.
Il valore RTP non è molto alto essendo pari al 94,74%, mentre la volatilità è alta.
Simboli e funzionalità
In questa slot abbiamo 5 simboli di basso valore e 5 di alto valore. Quelli che pagano meno sono le carte da gioco, dopodiché troviamo la lanterna, il fiore di loto, l’ideogramma e infine la sycee dorata, simbolo di ricchezza. La ragazza in abiti tradizionali è il nostro Wild e può apparire anche esteso, e va a sostituire tutti i simboli eccetto quelli speciali.
Durante il gioco regolare, se compaiono 5 o più simboli Wheel Bonanza, si attiva una funzione bonus. In questo caso la ruota di sinistra si sposterà e sostituirà la griglia di gioco. Essa è suddivisa in spicchi su cui sono indicati numerosi premi, dai moltiplicatori ai giri gratuiti, alle somme di denaro. La ruota comincerà a girare sinché non si fermerà sul simbolo corrispondente.
Durante i Free Spins, il simbolo del tempio blu aggiunge ulteriori 3 giri e moltiplicatori.
Tre diversi Wild estesi possono apparire sul rullo 3, accompagnati da moltiplicatori pari a 2x, 3x o 5x.
Se compare la scritta jackpot, allora sarà la ruota di destra a fuoriuscire da dietro la griglia di gioco.
Ci sono a disposizione 4 tipi di jackpot. Questi sono gli importi:

Mini, pari a 250 €
Minor, pari a 500 €
Major, pari a 5.000 €
Grand, pari a 50.000 €

raw_translation.response:
Moon Dancer
One of the most famous celebrations in China is undoubtedly New Year, a holiday that unlike the Western world, falls in the spring. This festivity has its roots in a curious legend. In fact, it is said that a terrible creature called Nian would wake up to eat with the arrival of the beautiful season. The food, needless to say, was humans. The only defense against the monster were the color red and loud noises which he was terrified of.
Even in Moon Dancer, the predominant color is red and the symbols all refer to Chinese tradition. The graphics are well calibrated, rich in detail and with some nice animations. Hidden behind the game grid, there are two wheels of which we can only see half of. During the spins, these wheels spin, showing us the prizes we can aspire to. On the left side Jackpots and multipliers are highlighted, on the right side the bonus wheel.
On the bottom, there are buttons to play and those to best set the bet. The music is oriental but relaxing at the right point.
Slot Features
The game grid has 5 reels and 3 rows and there are 50 paylines where you can bet a minimum of 1 €. The maximum bet is 20 € and can be set all at once by clicking on the Max button. Up to a maximum of 100 automatic spins can be activated.
The RTP value is not very high, being equal to 94.74%, while the volatility is high.
Symbols and Features
In this slot there are 5 low value symbols and 5 high value ones. The ones that pay the least are the playing cards, followed by the lantern, the lotus flower, the ideogram and finally the golden sycee, symbol of wealth. The girl in traditional garments is our Wild and can also appear expanded, replacing all symbols except for the special ones.
During regular play, if 5 or more Wheel Bonanza symbols appear, a bonus feature is activated. In this case, the left wheel will move and replace the game grid. It is divided into slices on which numerous prizes are indicated, from multipliers to free spins, to amounts of money. The wheel will start spinning until it stops on the corresponding symbol.
During Free Spins, the blue temple symbol adds an additional 3 spins and multipliers.
Three different expanded Wilds can appear on reel 3, accompanied by multipliers of 2x, 3x, or 5x.
If the jackpot text appears, then the right wheel will emerge from behind the game grid.
There are 4 types of jackpot available. These are the amounts:

Mini, equal to 250 €
Minor, equal to 500 €
Major, equal to 5,000 €
Grand, equal to 50,000 €

Moon Dancer 
One of the most famous celebrations in China is undoubtedly the New Year, a holiday that, unlike the Western world, falls in the spring. This celebration has its roots in a curious legend. It is said that a terrible creature called Nian woke up with the arrival of the beautiful season only to eat. The food, needless to say, was humans. The only defense against the monster was the color red and loud noises, which terrified it.

In Moon Dancer, the predominant color is red and all symbols refer to Chinese tradition. The graphics are well calibrated, rich in detail, and with some decent animations. The RTP value is not very high, being equal to 94.74%, while the volatility is high.

In this slot, we have 5 low-value symbols and 5 high-value ones. Those that pay the least are the playing cards, then we find the lantern, the lotus flower, the ideogram, and finally the golden sycee, a symbol of wealth. During Free Spins, the blue temple symbol adds an additional 3 spins and multipliers.
Three different extended Wilds can appear on reel 3, accompanied by multipliers of 2x, 3x, or 5x.

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Game overview and features
Symbols and Wilds
Bonus features
Graphics and sound
RTP and volatility

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

Review: Moon Dancer 
One of the most famous celebrations in China is undoubtedly the New Year, a holiday that, unlike the Western world, falls in the spring. This celebration has its roots in a curious legend. It is said that a terrible creature called Nian woke up with the arrival of the beautiful season only to eat. The food, needless to say, was humans. The only defense against the monster was the color red and loud noises, which terrified it.

In Moon Dancer, the predominant color is red and all symbols refer to Chinese tradition. The graphics are well calibrated, rich in detail, and with some decent animations. Behind the game grid, there are two wheels of which we can only see half. During the spins, these wheels spin, showing us the prizes we can aspire to. The left one indicates the bonuses and multipliers, while the right one shows the jackpots.

At the bottom, there are buttons to play and those to set the bet best. The music, needless to say, is oriental-inspired, relaxing at the right point.

Slot features:
The game grid has 5 reels and 3 rows, and there are 50 paylines on which to bet at least 1 €. The maximum bet is instead 20 € and can be set in one fell swoop by clicking on the Max button. You can activate up to a maximum of 100 automatic spins. 

The RTP value is not very high, being equal to 94.74%, while the volatility is high.

Symbols and functionalities:
In this slot, we have 5 low-value symbols and 5 high-value ones. Those that pay the least are the playing cards, then we find the lantern, the lotus flower, the ideogram, and finally the golden sycee, a symbol of wealth. The girl in traditional dress is our Wild and can also appear extended, replacing all symbols except the special ones.

During regular play, if 5 or more Wheel Bonanza symbols appear, a bonus feature is activated. In this case, the left wheel will move and replace the game grid. It is divided into segments on which numerous prizes are indicated, from multipliers to free spins, to sums of money. The wheel will spin until it stops on the corresponding symbol.

During Free Spins, the blue temple symbol adds an additional 3 spins and multipliers.
Three different extended Wilds can appear on reel 3, accompanied by multipliers of 2x, 3x, or 5x.
If the word jackpot appears, then it will be the right wheel to emerge from behind the game grid. 

There are 4 types of jackpots available. These are the amounts: 

Mini, equal to 250 € 
Minor, equal to 500 € 
Major, equal to 5,000 € 
Grand, equal to 50,000 €

Review:
 
Game Overview and Features

Moon Dancer is a Chinese-themed online slot game that celebrates the New Year festive season. The game has 5 reels, 3 rows, and 50 paylines. The game has a unique feature where two wheels behind the game grid spin, showing the prizes that can be won; the left wheel indicates bonuses and multipliers, while the right wheel shows the jackpots. The game is set to relaxing oriental-inspired music.

Symbols and Wilds

Moon Dancer has a total of 10 symbols, which include 5 low-value symbols, and 5 high-value ones. The low-value symbols are playing cards, while the high-value symbols are the lantern, the lotus flower, the ideogram, the golden sycee, and a girl in traditional dress that acts as the Wild symbol. The Wild symbol substitutes all other symbols except the special ones. During regular play, if 5 or more Wheel Bonanza symbols appear, a bonus feature is activated. There are 3 different extended Wild symbols with multipliers of 2x, 3x, and 5x. The blue temple symbol during Free Spins adds an additional 3 spins and multipliers.

Bonus features

During regular play, if 5 or more Wheel Bonanza symbols appear, a bonus feature is activated. In this case, the left wheel replaces the game grid and is divided into segments that indicate numerous prizes from multipliers to free spins to sums of money. The wheel spins until it stops on the corresponding symbol. If the word jackpot appears, then the right wheel will emerge from behind the game grid. There are 4 types of jackpots available in the game - Mini, Minor, Major, and Grand, with amounts ranging from 250 € to 50,000 €.

Graphics and Sound

Moon Dancer has well-calibrated graphics that are rich in detail and have decent animations. The game has a dominant red color, and all symbols refer to Chinese tradition. The game grid is set against a dark background with two wheels spinning behind it. The game has an oriental-inspired soundtrack that is relaxing.

Review: Moon Dancer 
One of the most famous celebrations in China is undoubtedly the New Year, a holiday that, unlike the Western world, falls in the spring. This celebration has its roots in a curious legend. It is said that a terrible creature called Nian woke up with the arrival of the beautiful season only to eat. The food, needless to say, was humans. The only defense against the monster was the color red and loud noises, which terrified it.

In Moon Dancer, the predominant color is red and all symbols refer to Chinese tradition. The graphics are well calibrated, rich in detail, and with some decent animations. Behind the game grid, there are two wheels of which we can only see half. During the spins, these wheels spin, showing us the prizes we can aspire to. The left one indicates the bonuses and multipliers, while the right one shows the jackpots.

At the bottom, there are buttons to play and those to set the bet best. The music, needless to say, is oriental-inspired, relaxing at the right point.

Slot features:
The game grid has 5 reels and 3 rows, and there are 50 paylines on which to bet at least 1 €. The maximum bet is instead 20 € and can be set in one fell swoop by clicking on the Max button. You can activate up to a maximum of 100 automatic spins. 

The RTP value is not very high, being equal to 94.74%, while the volatility is high.

Symbols and functionalities:
In this slot, we have 5 low-value symbols and 5 high-value ones. Those that pay the least are the playing cards, then we find the lantern, the lotus flower, the ideogram, and finally the golden sycee, a symbol of wealth. The girl in traditional dress is our Wild and can also appear extended, replacing all symbols except the special ones.

During regular play, if 5 or more Wheel Bonanza symbols appear, a bonus feature is activated. In this case, the left wheel will move and replace the game grid. It is divided into segments on which numerous prizes are indicated, from multipliers to free spins, to sums of money. The wheel will spin until it stops on the corresponding symbol.

During Free Spins, the blue temple symbol adds an additional 3 spins and multipliers.
Three different extended Wilds can appear on reel 3, accompanied by multipliers of 2x, 3x, or 5x.
If the word jackpot appears, then it will be the right wheel to emerge from behind the game grid. 

There are 4 types of jackpots available. These are the amounts: 

Mini, equal to 250 € 
Minor, equal to 500 € 
Major, equal to 5,000 € 
Grand, equal to 50,000 €
